_comment: Workflow Configuration - Control what runs on Unreal startup
_instructions: Set 'enabled' to true/false to control each phase. NO code editing required!

phase_0_test_arena.description: AI Vision Test Arena - 5 cameras, 4 test zones

phase_space_farming.description: Advanced space farming and agricultural mechanics

phase_multiplayer_foundation.description: Multiplayer foundation with networking, voice chat, and replication

phase_advanced_content_expansion.description: Advanced content expansion with housing, factions, mini-games, and economy

phase_ai_society_evolution.description: AI society evolution with neural networks, governance, and emergent storytelling

phase_next_generation_vr.description: Next-generation VR systems with full body tracking, haptic feedback, and neural interfaces

_usage.test_arena_only: Set only phase_0 and phase_0_5 to enabled: true
_usage.clean_slate: Disable ALL phases for manual control
_usage.full_build: Enable all phases (WARNING: will mix test + game content!)
_usage.continuous_mode: Enable phase_continuous_improvement for endless autonomous development
_usage.advanced_content_mode: Enable phase_advanced_content_expansion for housing, factions, and mini-games
_usage.ai_society_mode: Enable phase_ai_society_evolution for neural networks and living virtual society
_usage.next_generation_vr_mode: Enable phase_next_generation_vr for full body tracking, haptic feedback, and neural interfaces
